ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: ARCG 743 provided an engaging and interesting view into how to best present your research for the sake of grant proposals and other research-related programs. It provided students with excellent feedback designed to directly engage the student with their own research interests. The class also offered writing help and one-on-one direction. i would highly recommend this course to other graduate students.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course directly benefited my research and writing. I have a far better understanding go how to link theory and evidence to better support my own research interests. Because of this class I feel I have a better grasp on scientific writing as well as how to develop and write about my own research interests. What I learned in this class will be of use for years to come.
